Header.title: Welcome to my Portfolio
Header.paragraph: I am currently working as a LIMS admin in a FDA regulated environment. I have experience with software validation, and laboratory testing. I am currently learning full stack development

About.paragraph: I've been working in the FDA Regulated Environment since 2015. Since that time I have worked on projects, troubleshooting, and acted an Special Material Expert for both internal and external audits.
